conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
Based on the user's message, they seem interested in the mystery genre. From the list of movies provided, I would recommend the following two movies:

1. Knives Out - Directed by Rian Johnson, this film stars Daniel Craig as private investigator Ben Cadwell, who is hired to investigate the death of wealthy tycoon Neil Armstrong. The film follows Cadwell's investigation as he uncovers secrets about Armstrong and his family.

2. The Invisible Guest - Directed by Pablo Casariego, this film stars Javier Bardem as former dictator Señor Antonio Caro. After being released from prison, Caro becomes increasingly paranoid of his own safety. In an attempt to ensure their safety, Caro hires private investigator Rafael Caro. The investigation follows Caro's efforts to uncover the truth behind Caro's father's death in prison.
